attributes.mlflow.chat.messages:
[{"role": "user", "content": "請用 1 個句子總結以下內容，保持準確性：

內容：The human genome project was completed in 2003 after 13 years of international collaborative research. It successfully mapped all of the genes of the human genome, approximately 20,000-25,000 genes in total. The project cost nearly $3 billion but has enabled countless medical advances and spawned new fields like pharmacogenomics. The knowledge gained has dramatically improved our understanding of genetic diseases and opened pathways to personalized medicine. Today, a complete human genome can be sequenced in under a day for about $1,000.
"}, {"content": "人類基因組計畫於2003年完成，成功繪製約20,000-25,000個基因，促進了醫學進步和個性化醫療的發展，並使得如今完整的人類基因組可在一天內以約1,000美元的成本完成測序。", "refusal": null, "role": "assistant", "annotations": []}]
